level.heading: Reporting requirement.
level.text: The Director shall each year submit to the Mayor, for inclusion in the Mayor's report to the Council, as required by ยง 51-113(c), the number of individuals who received benefits for separation from employment due to domestic violence.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 15-171
level.text: For Law 15-171, see notes following ยง 51-131.
